items.name: Advanced Alteration Bench
items.description: The Advanced Alteration Bench is a late game technology that allows prospectors to create Attachment Packs (Tier 3) and Advanced Attachment Packs (Tier 4) to upgrade armor pieces, ranged weapons, and tools. An active power connection providing at least 1,500electricityto craft Attachment Packs is required. A power connection is not required to add and remove Attachment packs from items.

items.name: Advanced Masonry Bench
items.description: The Advanced Masonry Bench enables the construction ofScoria Brick Building PiecesandClay Brick Building Piecesand is able to craft items made theMasonry Benchat a faster rate, but only once the prospector researches the blueprint sets for those building pieces.

items.name: Advanced Textiles Bench
items.description: Allows for the crafting of more advancedArmorsets,Cured LeatherandPlatinum Weave. The Advanced Textiles Bench is also able to craft items made at theTextiles Bench, removing the need for multiple benches.

items.name: Alteration Bench
items.description: The Alteration Bench is a mid-to-late game technology that allows Prospectors to create Attachment Packs to upgrade armor pieces, ranged weapons, and tools.

items.name: Aluminium Beam
items.description: Resistant to weather, but lighter than Stone Buildings, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base, bringing with you the equivalent of a Stone Base in your backpack. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Door
items.description: Resistant to weather, but lighter than Stone Buildings, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base, bringing with you the equivalent of a Stone Base in your backpack. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Floor
items.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Floor Trapdoor
items.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Halfpieces
items.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Halfpitches
items.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Ladder
items.description: Resistant to weather, but lighter than Stone Buildings, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base, bringing with you the equivalent of a Stone Base in your backpack. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Railing
items.description: Resistant to weather, but lighter than Stone Buildings, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base, bringing with you the equivalent of a Stone Base in your backpack. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Ramp
items.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Roof
items.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Roof Corner
items.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Stairs
items.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Trapdoor
items.description: Resistant to weather, but lighter than Stone Buildings, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base, bringing with you the equivalent of a Stone Base in your backpack. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Wall
items.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Wall Angled
items.description: Very light to carry and fireproof, but lacking the weather resistance of stone, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Aluminium Window
items.description: Resistant to weather, but lighter than Stone Buildings, Aluminium Buildings are an asset when traveling to new areas far from your dropship or base, bringing with you the equivalent of a Stone Base in your backpack. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Animal Bed
items.description: The Animal Bed serves as a place for juvenile animals to sleep while taming and is required to tame juvenile animals. TamedMountsandPetscan also use the Animal Bed when tired.

items.name: Anvil Bench
items.description: The Anvil Bench is unlocked near the start of theTier 2Tech Tree. It enables the Prospector to craft higher quality tools such as theIron PickaxeandSteel Pickaxe. It is also where these tools can be repaired. While it can be placed with no shelter, it would be unusable. Will take damage if left without shelter (or under a severely damaged roof) in storms.

items.name: Arctic Chest Armor
items.description: Arctic Armor is a major upgrade toFur Armor, offering unrivaled cold resistance.

items.name: Art Deco 10-Seater Table
items.description: The Art Deco 10-Seater Table is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco 6-Seater Table
items.description: The Art Deco 6-Seater Table is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco Bed
items.description: The Art Deco Bed allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered and it is night time in-game.  In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bed, however if this bed is deconstructed or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to the drop-pod. The Art Deco Bed has the best sleep quality of any bed.

items.name: Art Deco Dining Chair
items.description: The Art Deco Dining Chair is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco Floor Lamp
items.description: The Art Deco Floor Lamp is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco Lounge Chair
items.description: The Art Deco Lounge Chair is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco Round Table
items.description: The Art Deco Round Table is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco Sitting Bench
items.description: The Art Deco Sitting Bench is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco Wall Light
items.description: The Art Deco Wall Light is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco Wall Shelf
items.description: The Art Deco Wall Shelf is an gilded item of significant worth.

items.name: Art Deco Wall Sign
items.description: The Art Deco Wall Sign is an gilded wall sign for labelled cupboards or other items in theArt Decostyle.

items.name: Basic Ceiling Light
items.description: The Basic Ceiling Light provides lighting for a Prospector's base. Requires 150 units ofpowerto function.

items.name: Basic Fishing Bench
items.description: The Basic Fishing Bench is where Prospectors can craft theWooden Fishing Rodand theRefined Wood Fishing Rod, as well as variousLureson the left hand side of the bench. The right side of the bench is used to fillet any fish caught using aFishing Rodor Fishing Trap. Does not require shelter to be used.

items.name: Basic Wall Light
items.description: The Basic Wall Light provides lighting for a Prospector's base. Requires 150 units ofpowerto function.

items.name: Bedroll
items.description: The Bedroll allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered, a campfire/heater/dehumidifier/etc is nearby, and it is night time in-game. In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Sleeping will provide the Well RestedStatus Effect. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bedroll, however if this bedroll is picked up or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to their drop pod.

items.name: Beeswax Wood Floor
items.description: Reinforced wood building pieces can be unlocked inTier 2of theTech Tree. These building pieces are more resistant to damage than their earlierWoodversions with the inclusion ofBeeswax

items.name: Beeswax Wood Ramp
items.description: Reinforced wood building pieces can be unlocked inTier 2of theTech Tree. These building pieces are more resistant to damage than their earlierWoodversions with the inclusion ofBeeswax

items.name: Beeswax Wood Roof Corner
items.description: Reinforced wood building pieces can be unlocked inTier 2of theTech Tree. These building pieces are more resistant to damage than their earlierWoodversions with the inclusion ofBeeswax

items.name: Beeswax Wood Wall
items.description: Reinforced wood building pieces can be unlocked inTier 2of theTech Tree. These building pieces are more resistant to damage than their earlierWoodversions with the inclusion ofBeeswax

items.name: Beeswax Wood Wall Angled
items.description: Reinforced wood building pieces can be unlocked inTier 2of theTech Tree. These building pieces are more resistant to damage than their earlierWoodversions with the inclusion ofBeeswax

items.name: Black Tusker Animal Bed
items.description: The Black Tusker Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a tusker theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

items.name: Bone Chest Armor
items.description: Bone Armor provides relatively good protection from Icarus' fauna as aTier 1armor with a minor boost to temperature resistance. Also provides a considerable damage increase when a full set is worn.

items.name: Brown Bear Chest Armor
items.description: Brown Bear Armor is an upgrade toBone Armor, offering higher physical resistance with a boost to melee attack speed. Though it may not increase attack damage, it pairs well with theCalibrated Grip Attachments andAttack Speed Attachments, further increasing knife attack speed.

items.name: Brutalist 10-Seater Table
items.description: The Brutalist 10-Seater Table seats ten and is mode from concrete, copper nails and glass.

items.name: Brutalist 6-Seater Table
items.description: The Brutalist 6-Seater Table seats six, is mode from concrete, copper nails and glass.

items.name: Brutalist Bed
items.description: The Brutalist Bed is mode from concrete and platinum weave, and has an increased sleep quality.

items.name: Brutalist Coffee Table
items.description: The Brutalist Coffee Table is mode from concrete, iron and glass.

items.name: Brutalist Dining Chair
items.description: The Brutalist Dining Chair seats one and is mode from concrete and leather.

items.name: Brutalist Lounge Chair
items.description: The Brutalist Lounge Chair is a minimalist chair made with concrete and leather in the Brutalist design aesthetic. It serves as a seat for Prospectors and provides a small bonus toCoziness.

items.name: Brutalist Octagonal Table
items.description: The Brutalist Octagonal Table seats six and is mode from concrete and copper nails.

items.name: Brutalist Sitting Bench
items.description: The Brutalist Sitting Bench is made soley from concrete and seats two prospectors.

items.name: Brutalist Wall Shelf
items.description: The Brutalist Wall Shelf is a decorative shelf for holding small items such asLampsor smallTrophies. It provides a small bonus toCoziness.

items.name: Burlap Animal Bed
items.description: The Burlap Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a basic theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

items.name: Carpentry Bench
items.description: While it can be placed with no shelter, it would be unusable. Will take damage if left without shelter (or under severely damaged roof) in storms.

items.name: Carved Wood Armchair
items.description: The Carved Wood Armchair is a decorative item.

items.name: Carved Wood Bed
items.description: The Carved Wood Bed allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered and it is night time in-game.  In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bed, however if this bed is deconstructed or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to the drop-pod.

items.name: Carved Wood Chair
items.description: The Carved Wood Chair is a decorative chair of two varieties, select R when deploying.

items.name: Carved Wood Coffee Table
items.description: The Carved Wood Coffee Table is a decorative item with two varieties, select R when deploying.

items.name: Carved Wood Large Table
items.description: The Carved Wood Large Table is a long wood table with room for 10 seats. The item has two build variants that can be selected with the 'R' key when deploying.

items.name: Carved Wood Round Table
items.description: The Carved Wood Round Table is a decorative round wood table.

items.name: Carved Wood Sitting Bench
items.description: The Carved Wood Sitting Bench is a decorative wooden bench that provides seating and a small bonus toCoziness.

items.name: Carved Wood Table
items.description: The Carved Wood Table is a decorative table with seating for six and a bonus toCoziness.

items.name: Carved Wood Wall Shelf
items.description: The Carved Wood Wall Shelf is a decorative item that has two varieties, select R when deploying.

items.name: Charging Station
items.description: The Charging Station charges basic battery powered devices like theFlashlightand requires 500Wattsto function.

items.name: Chemistry Bench
items.description: Grants the Prospector the ability to swiftly createMedicine,Fertilizer,Volatile SubstanceandDistilled Miasmic Coating.

items.name: Clay Brick Beam
items.description: Fired Clay Brick building material providing a more traditional brick aesthetic that is only available on Prometheus.

items.name: Clay Brick Floor
items.description: Fired Clay Brick building material providing a more traditional brick aesthetic that is only available on Prometheus.

items.name: Clay Brick Halfpieces
items.description: Fired Clay Brick building material providing a more traditional brick aesthetic that is only available on Prometheus.

items.name: Clay Brick Halfpitches
items.description: Fired Clay Brick building material providing a more traditional brick aesthetic that is only available on Prometheus.

items.name: Clay Brick Ramp
items.description: Fired Clay Brick building material providing a more traditional brick aesthetic that is only available on Prometheus.

items.name: Clay Brick Roof Corner
items.description: Fired Clay Brick building material providing a more traditional brick aesthetic that is only available on Prometheus.

items.name: Clay Brick Wall
items.description: Fired Clay Brick building material providing a more traditional brick aesthetic that is only available on Prometheus.

items.name: Clay Brick Wall Angle
items.description: Fired Clay Brick building material providing a more traditional brick aesthetic that is only available on Prometheus.

items.name: Cloth Chest Armor
items.description: Cloth Armor, while not being very protective in a fight, provides relatively good protection from the heat in deserts. It also makes traveling slightly quicker.

items.name: Composite Chest Armor
items.description: Composite Chest Armor is the highest tier of crafted armor in Icarus and thus provides superior protection from wildlife, while providing considerable insulation from the elements.

items.name: Concrete Beam
items.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

items.name: Concrete Floor
items.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

items.name: Concrete Floor Trapdoor
items.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

items.name: Concrete Frame
items.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

items.name: Concrete Furnace
items.description: Made at theMachining Bench, this Tier 3 furnace allows the smelting of mid-tier ores such asSteel Ingot+Super Cooled IceintoCold Steel IngotsandTitanium OreintoTitanium Ingots.

items.name: Concrete Halfpieces
items.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

items.name: Concrete Halfpitches
items.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

items.name: Concrete Railing
items.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

items.name: Concrete Ramp
items.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

items.name: Concrete Roof
items.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

items.name: Concrete Roof Corner
items.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

items.name: Concrete Stairs
items.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

items.name: Concrete Wall
items.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

items.name: Concrete Wall Angled
items.description: The strongest and most durable structures on Icarus. If a prospector wishes to have a permanent outpost, without worry of structural damage from wind/rain/fire/bears, concrete is the only choice.

items.name: Cooking Station
items.description: The Cooking Station is an early-game cooking bench that provides a way to for prospectors to process raw foods into resources, while also giving the prospector access to a variety of new foods with unique status effects.

items.name: Crafting Bench
items.description: The Crafting Bench allows the prospector to craftTier 2items. While it can be placed with no shelter, it would be unusable. Will take damage if left without shelter (or under severely damaged roof) in storms.

items.name: Crumbed Saltwater Fillet
items.description: Crumbed Saltwater Fillet is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Cured Leather Chest Armor
items.description: Cured Leather Armor is an upgrade toLeather Armor, providing an increase in physical resistance, thermal insulation, and a larger set bonus.

items.name: Decoration Bench
items.description: Although prospectors may not use this bench often, it is required to completeHomestead: Construction.

items.name: Dirt Corner
items.description: Dirt Corners are aTier 1buildable that are used in tandem withDirt Ramps, allowing for the creation of rounded ramps. Due to the nature of its building material, Dirt Corners must be attached to the terrain when placed; failure to do so will result in the collapse of the building piece.

items.name: Dirt Foundation
items.description: Dirt Foundations are aTier 1buildable that serves as an alternative toThatch Beams/Wood Beamsthat provides a more natural look to structures. Due to the nature of its building material, Dirt Foundations must be attached to the terrain when placed; failure to do so will result in the collapse of the building piece.

items.name: Dirt Ramp
items.description: Dirt Ramps are aTier 1buildable that serves as an alternative toThatch Ramps/Wood Rampsthat provides a more natural look to structures. Due to the nature of its building material, Dirt Ramps must be attached to the terrain when placed; failure to do so will result in the collapse of the building piece.

items.name: Electric Carpentry Bench
items.description: The Electric Carpentry Bench allows for manufacturing of refined wood deployables at a faster rate than theCarpentry Bench. Prospectors can use the Electric Carpentry Bench to craft furniture, like an improvedWooden Bed, and storage items like anInterior Wood Cupboard. The Electric Carpentry Bench can also create Interior Wood building pieces.

items.name: Electric Furnace
items.description: The Electric Furnace is the end-game furnace capable of smeltingComposite PasteintoComposites, a material required for mostTier 4blueprints, and can refine all other minerals faster than the lower tier furnaces.

items.name: Electric Masonry Bench
items.description: The Electric Masonry Bench enables the construction ofStone Building PiecesandConcrete Building Piecesat a faster rate than theMasonry BenchandCement Mixer, but only once the Prospector researches the blueprints for building pieces. The Electric Masonry Bench can also craft all building pieces made at theMasonry Bench/Advanced Masonry Bench.

items.name: Electric Textiles Bench
items.description: A power connection providing at least 2,500 ofpoweris required to utilize this bench. Allows for the crafting of more advancedArmorsets and items that can be made at theTextiles BenchandAdvanced Textiles Bench.

items.name: Elegant Curtain Door
items.description: The Elegant Curtain Door is a luxury decorative covering for a doorway.

items.name: Elegant Curtain Window
items.description: The Elegant Curtain Window is a luxury decorative window covering.

items.name: Fabricator
items.description: The Fabricator is the late-game crafting bench, it enables the crafting ofWeaponsandToolslike theCombat Knifeand aTitanium Pickaxe. It also enables the creation of power sources, such as theBiofuel Generator, and theRefrigerator.

items.name: Floor Torch
items.description: Basic lighting for a prospector's base or elsewhere.

items.name: Forge
items.description: The Forge is theTier 3variant of theAnvil Benchthat will allow the Prospector to craft higher quality tools such as thePlatinum Pickaxe,Cold Steel Knife, etc and items crafted at theAnvil Bench(Iron Axe,Copper Nails, etc). It is also where these tools can be repaired. Unlike other benches, the Forge can be deployed and used outdoors as it does not require shelter. Can be used indoors or outdoors.

items.name: Fried Chunky Vegetables
items.description: Fried Chunky Vegetables is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Fur Chest Armor
items.description: Fur armor is a sidegrade toLeather Armor, offering slightly less physical resistance in exchange for a major boost to cold resistance, making it a necessity when venturing into cold regions. It, however, greatly reduces resistance to heat, making it problematic when delving into hotter biomes.

items.name: Fur Curtain Door
items.description: A Fur Curtain Door to keep the weather out.

items.name: Fur Curtain Window
items.description: A Fur Curtain Window to decorate windows and keep the weather out.

items.name: Ghillie Chest Armor
items.description: Ghillie Chest Armor provides protection from the elements while also providing concealment from the keen eyes of prey.

items.name: Glass Beam
items.description: Glass building pieces while not being very resistance to damage, nor providing any thermal insulation, bring a nice aesthetic to any base. Green houses for outpost bases or for internal base pieces while on prospects are good uses for these items.

items.name: Glass Door
items.description: Glass building pieces while not being very resistance to damage, nor providing any thermal insulation, bring a nice aesthetic to any base. Green houses for outpost bases or for internal base pieces while on prospects are good uses for these items.

items.name: Glass Roof
items.description: Glass building pieces while not being very resistance to damage, nor providing any thermal insulation, bring a nice aesthetic to any base. Green houses for outpost bases or for internal base pieces while on prospects are good uses for these items.  Can be crafted as Reinforced Glass, increasing resistance to weather up to the level of Stone building peices and increasing HP from 500 to 2500.

items.name: Glass Roof Corner
items.description: Glass building pieces while not being very resistance to damage, nor providing any thermal insulation, bring a nice aesthetic to any base. Green houses for outpost bases or for internal base pieces while on prospects are good uses for these items. Can be crafted as Reinforced Glass, increasing resistance to weather up to the level of Stone building peices and increasing HP from 500 to 2500.

items.name: Glass Wall
items.description: Glass building pieces while not being very resistance to damage, nor providing any thermal insulation, bring a nice aesthetic to any base. Green houses for outpost bases or for internal base pieces while on prospects are good uses for these items.  Can be crafted as Reinforced Glass, increasing resistance to weather up to the level of Stone building peices and increasing HP from 500 to 2500.

items.name: Glass Wall Angled
items.description: Glass building pieces while not being very resistance to damage, nor providing any thermal insulation, bring a nice aesthetic to any base. Green houses for outpost bases or for internal base pieces while on prospects are good uses for these items.  Can be crafted as Reinforced Glass, increasing resistance to weather up to the level of Stone building peices and increasing HP from 500 to 2500.

items.name: Glass Window
items.description: Glass building pieces while not being very resistance to damage, nor providing any thermal insulation, bring a nice aesthetic to any base. Green houses for outpost bases or for internal base pieces while on prospects are good uses for these items.

items.name: Glassworking Bench
items.description: The Glassworking Bench is a mid-to-late game technology that allows Prospectors to createGlassresources and construction elements, like theGlass WindowandGlass Roof. In addition, Prospectors can create containers for food and beverages, such as theGlass BottleandGlass Jar.

items.name: Heated Animal Bed
items.description: The Heated Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a luxurious theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

items.name: Heavy Glass Window
items.description: Glass building pieces while not being very resistance to damage, nor providing any thermal insulation, bring a nice aesthetic to any base. Green houses for outpost bases or for internal base pieces while on prospects are good uses for these items.

items.name: Heavy Obsidian Chest Armor
items.description: Heavy Obsidian Armor is aTier 2armor specialized in heat resistance with a slightly higher physical resistance thanLeather Armorand a major boost in armor durability, great for taking on what the volcanic regions of Prometheus have to offer.

items.name: Heavy Trapdoor
items.description: The Heavy Trapdoor is part of the Concrete Buildings category, however lacking the need for concrete in construction, it is however an equal in longevity and durability.

items.name: Herbalism Bench
items.description: Allows for the crafting ofMedicinal Pastes and Tonicssuch asAntibiotic Tonicto cure ailments and afflictions.

items.name: Hunter Chest Armor
items.description: An upgrade toGhillie Armorwith over double the physical/exposure resistance and an increase to crouch movement speed when a full set is worn. The ideal armor for hunting that will give any prospector the advantage over wild game.

items.name: Industrial Bed
items.description: The Industrial Bed is made from metal and has an increased sleep quality.

items.name: Industrial Chair
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Chair

items.name: Industrial Coffee Table
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Coffee Table

items.name: Industrial Dining Chair
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Dining Chair

items.name: Industrial Large Table
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Large Table

items.name: Industrial Round Table
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Round Table

items.name: Industrial Sitting Bench
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Sitting Bench

items.name: Industrial Table
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Table

items.name: Industrial Wall Shelf
items.description: A minimalist Industrial Wall Shelf

items.name: Interior Wood Beam
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Door
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Floor
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Ramp
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Trapdoor
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Wall
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Wall Angled
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Jaguar Buffalo Animal Bed
items.description: The Jaguar Buffalo Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a Jaguar and Buffalo theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

items.name: Kitchen Bench
items.description: The Kitchen Bench is a mid/late-game crafting bench that expands on cooking foods and it is also the path for creating more advanced medicines.

items.name: Kitchen Storage Block
items.description: A Kitchen Storage Block made of refined wood and copper nails, use it to store your kitchen essentials. Must be snapped to aKitchen Benchto be placed. It has 40 inventory slots.

items.name: LM Beastmaster Chest Armor
items.description: The LM Beastmaster Chest Armor is part of theLM Beastmaster Armor Set, which can be unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. The armor set comes with buffs toMountsand tamed creatures.

items.name: Leather Chest Armor
items.description: Leather armor may not offer much protection when fighting against Icarus'Fauna, but it offers more physical protection and thermal insulation than itsTier 1counterparts, serving as a decent all-around armor forTier 2.

items.name: Leather Curtain Door
items.description: A Leather Curtain Door made of wood and Leather, use it to keep the weather out.

items.name: Leather Curtain Window
items.description: A Leather Curtain Window made of wood and Leather, use it to keep the weather out.

items.name: MXC Furnace
items.description: The MXC Furnace is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospector's loadout before starting a new prospect. The MXC Furnace functions like a smaller, more lightweightStone Furnace, and allows for processing ofIron Ore,Copper Ore, andSteel Bloominto ingots.

items.name: Machining Bench
items.description: Mid-level crafting system made at theCrafting Bench, the Machining Bench provides access toTier 3Blueprints. Prospectors can use it to createDeployablesandFirearms.

items.name: Marble Kitchen Bench
items.description: The Marble Kitchen Bench is a late-game crafting bench that expands on cooking foods and contains the recipes that can be found in theCooking Station. Crafts 50% faster than theKitchen Bench. A water connection is not required for the Marble Kitchen Bench to function.

items.name: Marble Kitchen Storage
items.description: The Marble Kitchen Storage is used to store kitchen essentials and must be snapped to aKitchen Benchto be placed. The Marble Kitchen Storage has 40 slots.

items.name: Masonry Bench
items.description: The Masonry Bench enables the construction ofStone Building PiecesandScoria Building Pieces, but only once the prospector researches the blueprint sets for those building pieces.

items.name: Medicine Bench
items.description: Allows for the crafting ofMedicinal Pastes and Tonicssuch asAntibiotic Pill,Survival KitsandHealth Recovery Elixirto cure and prevent ailments and afflictions. It can also be used to craftVolatile SubstanceandFertilizer.

items.name: Obsidian Chest Armor
items.description: Obsidian Armor is a sidegrade ofComposite Armor, providing slightly more physical resistance and a substantial bonus to heat resistance.

items.name: Plumbed Sink
items.description: The Plumbed Sink is bench that can be connected to other Marble Appliances and, when connected to active water connection, provides a short buff when interacted with. The Buff increases crafting speed, movement speed, health regeneration, and reduced water and food consumption. 250 units ofWateris required for the Plumbed Sink to function.

items.name: Portable Beacon
items.description: When deployed, the Portable Beacon will display a map marker that is visible on the map and compass, which is helpful for marking locations of caves/bases/predator spawns/or anything else a Prospector wishes to mark. When interacting with the Portable Beacon, Prospectors can choose from a list of available icons and colors to customize the icon displayed. Must be placed outdoors.

items.name: Portable Biofuel Generator
items.description: The Portable Biofuel Generator generatesElectricitywhen supplied with biofuel from aBiofuel Can.

items.name: Portable Biofuel Tank
items.description: Portable Biofuel Tank is used forBiofuelstorage. It is either filled at theBiofuel ComposterorElectric Composter.

items.name: Portable Icebox Backpack
items.description: A handy backpack to prevent your food from spoiling on long journeys. Will run for 1 hour on a full charge. Can be recharged at aCharging Station.

items.name: Portable Water Tank
items.description: Portable Water Tank is a deployable that can be connected to a water network once placed to store 150,000 of water and can output 1,000 water per second to keep the network operational. It is the equivalent to aWater Barrelwith having half of the storage, but it can be picked up into your character's Backpack/Equipment Slot (G).

items.name: Ranching Station
items.description: The Ranching Station allows the prospector to craft variousTier 2equipment to use and maintain mounts and pets. This includes severalFood Troughs/Water Troughs,Animal Beds,Saddles/Carts,Animal Feed, and otherRanching Deployables. Must be placed outside.

items.name: Regent Animal Bed
items.description: The Regent Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a luxurious theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

items.name: Reinforced Curtain Door
items.description: Reinforced Curtain Door is a sturdy fabric covering for a doorway.

items.name: Reinforced Curtain Window
items.description: Reinforced Curtain Window is a sturdy fabric covering for a window.

items.name: Reinforced Door
items.description: The Reinforced Door is part of theReinforced Wood Building Trim Set, which is learned in theTier 2Tech Tree after unlocking theCarpentry Bench. Can be repaired with aHammer.

items.name: Reinforced Glass Beam
items.description: Reinforced Glass Beam is a building piece made fromReinforced Glassthat provides more durability and resistance to weather than standard glass buildings.

items.name: Reinforced Glass Floor
items.description: Reinforced Glass Floor is a building piece made fromReinforced Glassthat provides more durability and resistance to weather than standard glass buildings.

items.name: Reinforced Glass Halfpieces
items.description: Reinforced Glass Halfpieces are building pieces made fromReinforced Glassthat provides more durability and resistance to weather than standard glass buildings.

items.name: Reinforced Glass Halfpitches
items.description: Reinforced Glass Halfpitches are building pieces made fromReinforced Glassthat provides more durability and resistance to weather than standard glass buildings.

items.name: Reinforced Glass Roof
items.description: Reinforced Glass Roof is a building piece made fromReinforced Glassthat provides more durability and resistance to weather than standard glass buildings.

items.name: Reinforced Glass Roof Corner
items.description: Reinforced Glass Roof Corner is a building piece made fromReinforced Glassthat provides more durability and resistance to weather than standard glass buildings.

items.name: Reinforced Glass Wall
items.description: Reinforced Glass Wall is a reinforced and more durable version of aGlass Wall. It is used as aBuilding Piecefor constructing a glass wall section such as for a greenhouse.

items.name: Reinforced Glass Wall Angled
items.description: Reinforced Glass Wall Angled is a building piece made fromReinforced Glassthat provides more durability and resistance to weather than standard glass buildings.

items.name: Reinforced Ladder
items.description: Reinforced Building Pieces at learned in theTier 2Tech Tree after unlocking theMasonry Bench, and other required Stone Bulding Pieces first. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Reinforced Railing
items.description: Reinforced Building Pieces at learned in theTier 2Tech Tree after unlocking theMasonry Bench, and other required Stone Bulding Pieces first. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Reinforced Trapdoor
items.description: Reinforced Building Pieces at learned in theTier 2Tech Tree after unlocking theMasonry Bench, and other required Stone Bulding Pieces first. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Reinforced Window
items.description: Reinforced Building Pieces at learned in theTier 2Tech Tree after unlocking theMasonry Bench, and other required Stone Bulding Pieces first. Can be repaired with aRepair Hammer.

items.name: Repair Bench
items.description: The Repair Bench has the ability to repair all items you’re wearing or have placed on the bench with a single click, regardless of where they were crafted. When combined with a power connection (1,500electricity) it can also repairTier 4and Orbital Workshop items. To repair Orbital Workshop Items, aWorkshop Repair Kitis required.

items.name: Roast Vegetables
items.description: Roast Vegetables is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Royal Animal Bed
items.description: The Royal Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a luxurious theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

items.name: Rustic Armchair
items.description: The Rustic Armchair seats one prospector

items.name: Rustic Bed
items.description: The Rustic Bed allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered and it is night time in-game.  In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bed, however if this bed is deconstructed or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to the drop-pod.

items.name: Rustic Coffee Table
items.description: The Rustic Coffee Table allows prospectors to store 10 items

items.name: Rustic Dining Chair
items.description: The Rustic Dining Chair a rustic chair that seats one prospector.

items.name: Rustic Large Table
items.description: The Rustic Large Table is a simple long wooden table.

items.name: Rustic Round Table
items.description: The Rustic Round Table is a simple wooden table.

items.name: Rustic Sitting Bench
items.description: The Rustic Sitting Bench seats two prospectors.

items.name: Rustic Table
items.description: The Rustic Table is a simple wooden table.

items.name: Salting Station
items.description: The Salting Station is an early-game cooking bench that provides a way to for Prospectors to preserve foods usingSalt. Once a food is salted, it will receive the Preserved modifier, increasing spoil time by 100%. Salting a food item will reset its spoil timer, even if the item is nearly spoiled. This technique can be used to further extend the spoilage.

items.name: Sandworm Chest Armor
items.description: Sandworm Chest Armor is made from the scales dropped from aSandworm. Provides exceptional heat protection with the added bonus of poison resistance when worn with a full set ofSandworm Armor.

items.name: Scoria Beam
items.description: Scoria building material, while not as robust as Scoria Brick Building Pieces is still an effective choice.

items.name: Scoria Brick Beam
items.description: Scoria Brick Beam is a fired scoria building material that is lightweight.

items.name: Scoria Brick Floor
items.description: Scoria Brick Floor is a fired scoria building material that is lightweight.

items.name: Scoria Brick Halfpieces
items.description: Scoria Brick Halfpieces is a fired scoria building material that is lightweight.

items.name: Scoria Brick Halfpitches
items.description: Scoria Brick Halfpitches is a fired scoria building material that is lightweight.

items.name: Scoria Brick Ramp
items.description: Scoria Brick Ramp is a fired scoria building material that is lightweight.

items.name: Scoria Brick Roof Corner
items.description: Scoria Brick Roof Corner is a fired scoria building material that is lightweight.

items.name: Scoria Brick Wall
items.description: Scoria Brick Wall is a fired scoria building material that is lightweight.

items.name: Scoria Brick Wall Angle
items.description: Scoria Brick Wall Angle is a fired scoria building material that is lightweight.

items.name: Scoria Floor
items.description: Scoria building material, while not as robust as Scoria Brick Building Pieces is still an effective choice.

items.name: Scoria Frame
items.description: Scoria building material, while not as robust as Scoria Brick Building Pieces, it is still an effective choice.

items.name: Scoria Halfpieces
items.description: Scoria building material, while not as robust as Scoria Brick Building Pieces, it is still an effective choice.

items.name: Scoria Halfpitches
items.description: Scoria building material, while not as robust as Scoria Brick Building Pieces, it is still an effective choice.

items.name: Scoria Ramp
items.description: Scoria building material, while not as robust as Scoria Brick Building Pieces, it is still an effective choice.

items.name: Scoria Roof Corner
items.description: Scoria building material, while not as robust as Scoria Brick Building Pieces, it is still an effective choice.

items.name: Scoria Wall
items.description: Scoria building material, while not as robust as Scoria Brick Building Pieces, it is still an effective choice.

items.name: Scoria Wall Angled
items.description: Scoria building material, while not as robust as Scoria Brick Building Pieces, it is still an effective choice.

items.name: Scorpion Chest Armor
items.description: Scorpion Chest Armor is aTier 2crafted armor requiring aTextiles Bench; however, it is difficult to acquire due to the challenge of defeatingHusk: Exterminationand requiringScorpion Carapace. It has unique set bonuses for returning damage to the attacker and has one of the highest physical resistances in the game.

items.name: Skinning Bench
items.description: The Skinning Bench is used to process, the small to medium carcasses, of theFaunafound on Icarus. While the yields from the skinning bench differ from skinning wildlife withKnives, most notably is the ability to always obtain rarer cuts of meat from fauna such asRaw Stringy Meat.

items.name: Snow Leopard Skin Animal Bed
items.description: The Snow Leopard Skin Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a snow leopard theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

items.name: Sprinters Animal Feed
items.description: Sprinters Animal Feed is aAnimal FeedforPetsorMountswith a uniqueStatus Effect. Can be fed to mounts to satisfyHunger. Sprinters Animal Feed decays in 10,800 seconds, but that decay can be slowed down by storing Sprinters Animal Feed inside anIce BoxorRefrigerator.

items.name: Stone Beam
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.

items.name: Stone Brick Beam
items.description: Stone Brick pieces offer +10 Insulation from Temperature, +100% Falling Tree Resistance and +65% Wind Resistance.

items.name: Stone Brick Floor
items.description: Stone Brick pieces offer +10 Insulation from Temperature, +100% Falling Tree Resistance and +65% Wind Resistance.

items.name: Stone Brick Ramp
items.description: Stone Brick pieces offer +10 Insulation from Temperature, +100% Falling Tree Resistance and +65% Wind Resistance.

items.name: Stone Brick Roof Corner
items.description: Stone Brick pieces offer +10 Insulation from Temperature, +100% Falling Tree Resistance and +65% Wind Resistance.

items.name: Stone Brick Wall
items.description: Stone Brick pieces offer +10 Insulation from Temperature, +100% Falling Tree Resistance and +65% Wind Resistance.

items.name: Stone Brick Wall Angle
items.description: Stone Brick pieces offer +10 Insulation from Temperature, +100% Falling Tree Resistance and +65% Wind Resistance.

items.name: Stone Floor
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.

items.name: Stone Floor Trapdoor
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.

items.name: Stone Furnace
items.description: The Stone Furnace is used for smelting metals such asIron Ore,Copper Ore, orSteel Bloom. Will take damage in storms if left un-sheltered.

items.name: Stone Ramp
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.

items.name: Stone Roof
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.

items.name: Stone Roof Corner
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.

items.name: Stone Stairs
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.

items.name: Stone Wall
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.

items.name: Stone Wall Angled
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.

items.name: Striker Terrenus Animal Bed
items.description: The Striker Terrenus Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has an... unsettling theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

items.name: Textiles Bench
items.description: Allows for the crafting of variousArmorsets, such as theLeather Armor Set,Fur Armor Set,Ghillie Armor Set,Sandworm Armor Set, and theScorpion Armor Set. Items like theBasic Riding Saddle,Simple Creature DeterrentandRopecan also be made at the Textiles Bench.

items.name: Thatch Beam
items.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For different orientations, hold R while holding a Thatch Beam (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

items.name: Thatch Door
items.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Can be attached to door frames (hold R while holding a Wall Building Piece and select the door frame variant from the radial menu).

items.name: Thatch Floor
items.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For the trapdoor floor variant, hold R while holding a Thatch Floor and select the Trapdoor variant from the radial wheel (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

items.name: Thatch Halfpieces
items.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For different variants, hold R while holding a Thatch Halfpiece (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

items.name: Thatch Halfpitches
items.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For different variants, hold R while holding Thatch Halfpitches (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

items.name: Thatch Ladder
items.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and best used as temporary shelters while away from any 'Main Base' the prospectors may have established. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Thatch ladders cannot be snapped to trapdoor floors.

items.name: Thatch Railing
items.description: The Thatch Railing is part of theThatch Building Trim Set, which is learned in theTier 1Tech Tree after unlocking theThatch Building Base Set.

items.name: Thatch Roof
items.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers.For the Ramp/Stairs variant, hold R while holding a Thatch Roof(more item actions can be seen bottom right).

items.name: Thatch Roof Corner
items.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For different variants, hold R while holding a Thatch Roof Corner (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

items.name: Thatch Trapdoor
items.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best suited as emergency shelters. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Attaches to floors with trapdoor holes (hold R while holding a floor building piece and select the Trapdoor variant from the radial wheel).

items.name: Thatch Wall
items.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters, or as scaffolding inside caves. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For window/doorway variants, hold R while holding a Thatch Wall (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

items.name: Thatch Wall Angled
items.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. For different variants, hold R while holding a Thatch Wall Angled (more item actions can be seen bottom right).

items.name: Thatch Window
items.description: Thatch building pieces are very light-weight and are best used for emergency shelters. While subject to damage from milder storms than any other material, they are light enough to carry and will still offer protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Attaches to window frames (hold R while holding a wall building piece and select the Window Frame variant from the radial wheel).

items.name: Trophy Bench
items.description: The Trophy Bench allows prospectors to createTrophiesfrom variousVestiges, for eventual display around a building or outpost.

items.name: Vegetable Oil
items.description: Vegetable Oil is an intermediary resource used to createBiofuel,Cured Leather, aSubmachine Gunand variousFoodrecipes.

items.name: Vegetable Pie
items.description: Vegetable Pie is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Vegetable Roll
items.description: Vegetable Roll is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Wall Torch
items.description: Wall lighting for a prospector's base. Provides limited heat. Will not be damaged by storms if placed outside.

items.name: Wayfarer Chest Armor
items.description: Wayfarer Chest Armor is a mid-gameTier 3crafted armor which can aid prospectors traveling through the Deserts on Icarus.

items.name: Wolfskin Animal Bed
items.description: The Wolfskin Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a wolf theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.

items.name: Wood Beam
items.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Wood beams require another structure for adjacent 'snapping' and seem to apply 'well stabilized' to a larger area than theThatch Beam.

items.name: Wood Door
items.description: Wood Door is crafted in theCharacter Craftingwith the following resources:

items.name: Wood Floor
items.description: Wood Floor is crafted in theCharacter Craftingwith the following resources:

items.name: Wood Roof
items.description: Wood Roof is crafted in theCharacter Craftingwith the following resources:

items.name: Wood Roof Corner
items.description: Wood Roof Corner is crafted in theCharacter Craftingwith the following resources:

items.name: Wood Table
items.description: The Wood Table is a decorative item that can be used for deployables like theMortar and Pestleand provides a bonus toCoziness.

items.name: Wood Trapdoor
items.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for Prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable, they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Attaches to floors with trapdoor holes (hold R while holding a floor piece and select the Trapdoor variant from the radial wheel).

items.name: Wood Wall
items.description: Wood Wall is crafted in theCharacter Craftingwith the following resources:

items.name: Wood Wall Angled
items.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Wood wall angles may be snapped into existing floors or walls such asWood Wall. Holding 'R' while placing the angled wood wall for additional placement styles or directionality.

items.name: Wood Wall Fortification
items.description: The Wood Wall Fortification serves as large wall that can attachWood Spikes Fortificationsto fend off the predators of Icarus. Similar toMedium Wood Hedgehogs, the Wood Wall Fortification does not take damage during storms.

items.name: Wood Window
items.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for Prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable, they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection toDeployablesandStoragecontainers. Wood Windows may be snapped into walls such asWood Wallthat have been placed in 'window' configuration. Holding 'R' while placing aWood Wall, for example, allows for additional placement styles, such as the window frame.

items.name: Wooden Bed
items.description: The Wooden Bed allows prospectors to sleep provided it is sufficiently sheltered and it is night time in-game.  In a multiplayer game, all prospectors must sleep at the same time to pass the night. Prospectors can set their respawn location to a bed, however if this bed is deconstructed or destroyed, the prospector's spawn location will reset back to the drop-pod.

items.name: Wooden Chair
items.description: A Wooden Chair made of refined wood and copper nails.

items.name: Zebra Animal Bed
items.description: The Zebra Animal Bed is a bed forMountsandPetsthat has a zebra theme. It is available as part of theCreature Comforts DLC. Provides no additional attributes and is a cosmetic change to theAnimal Bed.
